question: Which of the following statements are true about the Lokpal and Lokayuktas Act (2013)?
option1: It seeks to establish the institution of the Lokpal at the level of the state
option2: It seeks to establish the institution of the Lokyukta at the Centre
explanation: The Lokpal and Lokayuktas Act, 2013 aims to establish the institution of the Lokpal at the Centre. For states, Lokayukta are established.
